public class HdfsProxyServer extends com.telenav.kivakit.application.Server implements HdfsProxy
This server application is compiled into an executable JAR file that is launched by the *kivakit-filesystems-hdfs* package NOTE: When the HDFS proxy is updated, follow the instructions documented in HdfsProxyClient.
